summary: You know more about tony stark than I do - does he look blonder in that new clip where they're all wearing the red&white suits...
question: You know more about tony stark than I do - does he look blonder in that new clip where they're all wearing the red&white suits or is that just me?
answer:
I’m happy to be a reliable source on Tony Stark, thank you so much anon ❤️

Anyway, yup, not only in that frame, but also in the scene where he shakes his hand with Steve and in the newest trailer (the one that had been released yesterday).

My hot take is that considering that time travel will 90% be a thing in Endgame, they are trying to make him as different as possible from Avengers!Tony, even if it’s a process that began since post AoU, I’d say. (Someone pointed out that he has greying hair in CW)

I’m on mobile now and I can’t provide pics, but I’ll add them tomorrow morning!

summary:
Natasha and Tony the night before Christmas, talking to Peter. 
Tony: your brother’s tooth just fell
Peter: cool
Natasha: not...
body:
Natasha and Tony the night before Christmas, talking to Peter.

Tony: your brother’s tooth just fell

Peter: cool

Natasha: not cool, that means I have to dress up as a fictional character for two nights in a row

Peter: oh because you are tooth fairy tonight and tomorrow you’ll be santa???

Natasha: no because today I’m tooth fairy and last night I was cat Woman for your father

summary: Rhodey having a crush on you would include :
body:
Rhodey having a crush on you would include :

-Him being quite quick to ask Tony a lot about you after one meeting, trying his best to be casual about it but his friend can already tell he wants to ask you out and intends to meet up with you

-Him trying to make it seem like a coincidence when he bumps into you and just take that time to talk to you or even spend some time with you as he assures you he was going to that same place as well

-Him being in a better mood when you’re around and just being more talkative, starting some inside jokes with you, only to get flustered whenever someone points out to him that he should give his flirting a rest for the day

-Him getting annoyed when the others try to flirt with you and just interrupting them as he walks between you both and literally holds onto the other person to hint at them that they shouldn’t try anymore

-Him trying to impress you as he shows off what he can do in his suit and such, even more as he manages to save or protect you, ending up making you laugh as he always says something corny

-Him being quite attentive to you when you’d talk, catching onto a lot of your interests and likes, and just surprising you with some of your favourite snack and such just to cheer you up whenever he notices you being down

-Him always being the first one that has whatever little thing you seem to need, surprising everyone with how casual he is and them just wondering if you’re not already together

-Him just always looking at Tony and hoping he won’t say anything about whatever he did that was embarrassing, clearly looking at him and hinting that he doesn’t need you to find out, making you wonder what’s going on with their back and forth banter

-Tony being fast to just playfully praise him or make a comment about how he’s suddenly so attentive when you’re around, totally pointing it out to you that he has a thing for you, only for him to just get him to stop

-Him loving to mess with you and just pretending to be unconscious after a fight when you’d find him and try to wake him up, only to laugh and smile when you’d practically confess to him first

Tags : @bat-with-a-crown​, @nikkinikki97​, @madamrogers​, @uss-lesbian​, @tearsofebony​. @shersuperwho-blog, @meloz-draws, @angel-with-broken-wings, @pan-and-proud-writes , @lynn8dabeast92-blog ,  @zombie-zayde , @jaspocalypse , @umaveznosonho, @littlemisstrancy , @emmet-dean-the-demon-king , @Erikaaferns, @ecurrier109 , @purplemuse89, @fandomwritingismylife , @ichimaruai,@samwinchesterhasbeensaved, @happyshaddow94 ,@master-of-schadenfreude, @my-youth-is-my-own , @iammostdefinitelyonfire26 , @girlmeetsbullshit, @withered8dandelion , @forestraccoon, @byzantium-glytch,@somerandomstufftosave, @castiel-ships-wincest​, @addie-baby ,@daydreamerblues, @klutzbeefy, @teareid , @raviolin-down-the-streets ,  @ravenscryx , @marvel-obsessed-and-whatnot

summary: Countdown to Avengers Endgame: Iron Man 3
title: Countdown to Avengers Endgame: Iron Man 3
body:
Countdown to Avengers Endgame: Iron Man 3

We’re in the Endgame now. Just 14 days to go before Marvel Studios unleashes the biggest theatrical event in a generation (if not ever), capping off a story that is 11 years and 21 films in the making. There’s no denying that what Marvel has done here is unprecedented. As we approach the big day lets take a look back at the films that lead us here.

Let’s just get it out of the way. Iron Man 3…

View On WordPress

blog.name: magnusthefish
blog.title: most of my posts are about kit and that’s valid
blog.description:
'Mark held up his plastic bag. Inside it, a small orange fish swam around in a circle. “This is the best patrol we’ve ever done,” he said. “I have never been awarded a fish before.” ...

“I have won for you a fish, my fair one,” he said, and kissed her on the cheek ...

“I couldn’t keep a fish alive,” she (Emma) said. “I kill plants just by looking at them.”

“I suspect I would have the same problem,” Mark said, eyeing the fish. “It is too bad—I was going to name it Magnus, because it has sparkly scales.” At that, Cristina giggled. Magnus Bane was the High Warlock of Brooklyn, and he had a penchant for glitter. “I suppose I had better let him go free,” Mark said. Before anyone could say anything, he made his way to the railing of the pier and emptied the bag, fish and all, into the sea.

“Does anyone want to tell him that goldfish are freshwater fish and can’t survive in the ocean?” said Julian quietly.

“Not really,” said Cristina.

“Did he just kill Magnus?” Emma asked'

well this was supposed to be a tsc blog but it turned into a kit blog ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

 A (VERY) PROUD MEMBER OF THE KIT HERONDALE SUPPORTIVE ARMY!!!!!!!! 

annie (yep i finally decided to say what my name is) // dedicated kit stan // filled with love for my friends // and literally everyone else // my tags are obnoxiously long // and i don't know what this description is // but hey

tags: this is an actual conversation i had
in conclusion he’s nothing like tony stark
my friends are weird but i love them
summary:
my friend: i’m iron man!
me: really
my friend: yes, i’m actually exactly the same as tony stark
me: are you a genius?
my...
body:
my friend: i’m iron man!
me: really
my friend: yes, i’m actually exactly the same as tony stark
me: are you a genius?
my friend, who is definitely not a genius: yes
me: are you a billionaire?
my friend, who is definitely not a billionaire: yes
me: are you a playboy?
my friend: uhhhhh okay maybe i’m not exactly the same as tony stark
me: are you a philanthropist?
my friend: i don’t actually know what that word means, but yes i am, fight me

dialogue.label: my friend:
dialogue.phrase: yes, i’m actually exactly the same as tony stark

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Who Is He?
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2P6B49c

by doctornineandthreequarters

Everyone liked Peter. Anyone who met him at the Compound couldn’t help but be taken in by the teenager’s infectious energy. He talked a mile a minute and had to be reminded to slow down, but he was well-liked. But everyone felt like there was some shroud of secrecy around the teen.

—-

Iron Dad Bingo #4- Trope: Everyone thinks Peter is Tony’s kid.

Words: 1353, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Iron Dad Bingo

  • Fandoms: Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Clint Barton, Steve Rogers, Sam Wilson, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Avengers Team
  • Additional Tags: Precious Peter Parker, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Parent Tony Stark, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Clint Barton & Natasha Romanov Friendship, Rogue Avengers


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2P6B49c

title: Just Like That
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Pf0fGV

by starkind

That feeling when your best friend is about to wed the man of his dreams?

Well, surely you are excited and happy for him.

His best friend, however, is an entirely different story…

blog.name: natashastarkotp
blog.title: NatashaStark
blog.description:
Trying to keep tonynat alive. Y’all sleeping on a power couple here.

Header made by @kelslk-art

IronWidow focus but ships Tony with pretty much everyone else so expect some other pairings. She/Her.

tags: oh my god this was supposed to be two paragraphs
summary: Ok but imagine this: Tony has the super soldier seurum. It was injected in his bloodstream while his mom was pregnant. Because...
body:
Ok but imagine this: Tony has the super soldier seurum. It was injected in his bloodstream while his mom was pregnant. Because of this, the changes that happened to him were a lot different than the ones that happened to Captain America, he ages a bit slower, sure, but he’s not that strong (Rhodey opens the pickle jars). His sperm though, pretty potent.

And so one night while the other Avengers are asleep, they get really drunk on his workshop. Natasha tells him she can’t have kids even thought she really wants them, because her body kills any sperm that enters it. Tony tells her he literally has super sperm which could probably bypass that. And just like that they have an idea.

The next morning they wake up in bed together, in a cozy (a.k.a tiny) apartment. They have no idea what happened the night before, where they are, or how they got there in the first place.

Nat starts exploring the place and Tony goes to the bathroom to freshen up, and when he looks at the trash can he notices that there is no condom. Which means they probably didn’t use one.

He goes back to the room and Natasha shows up and tells him they’re in Queens. They talk about the previous night and decide that they need some time to rethink their relationship and how they see it.

Anyways, four weeks later she starts feeling sick when she wakes up. But she can’t be pregnant, that’s ridiculous. So time passes and she keeps quiet about it. She tries changing her diet (doesn’t work), adding more time to her yoga routine (doesn’t work either), taking three times the amount of days off she took in her entire lifetime in the span of four months, but nothing works.

And then she felt it. Something was wrong with her body, seriously wrong. So she rushed to SHIELD and asked Coulson if she could do a full medical checkup, that way it’d be kept under the wraps.

The doctor tells her there is nothing wrong with her body, her baby kicking is just a sign of a perfectly healthy kid. She almost broke the woman’s neck. I mean, she doesn’t know why, but she did gain some weight lately, not enough to people think that she’s pregnant thought. Helen Cho got scared by her tone, but said that she can prove Natasha is indeed pregnant. Nat’s reluctant but she does the ultrasound anyway. And surprise surprise, she’s having a baby.

Suddenly, the memories from that night came back to her. They decided they’d get pregnant and take care of the kid, they’d be parents together but not involved in a romantical way, and they’d only have sex to achieve that goal. And then they drank more and more and she joked about them moving in somewhere else. So Tony bought an apartment for them, fully furnished with an extra empty room they could make a nursery out of.

She goes up to his room to give him the news but he’s not there, so she goes back to her room to rest and think. When she gets there, guess who’s spreading lotion on his chest wearing her almost transparent light pink flowery robe?

He’s estactic to hear the news and they decide to follow through their plan. Of course, they don’t really leave the team, they’re still there for meetings and stuff, but they don’t go to missions anymore. Natasha is not going to risk her baby for anything in this world, neither is Tony.

They call themseleves roomates. That’s all. That’s all they are. Nothing more. Aboslutely nothing more. Right?

They drive each other crazy, and anyone who saw them would think they hate each other. May and Peter Parker, the people who live on the apartment in front of theirs, are certain that that’s not the case. The first time he heard their lame excuses to Mr. Jenkins, the landlord, he couldn’t help but say from the other side of the room “oh my god they were roomates”.

And then the kid comes and Nat presses her lips against Tony’s on the way to the hospital. When her contractions start hurting like a bitch he calms does his best to help by leaving all the kisses he can on her forehead, cheeks and nose. Then when the labour is done and they meet their beautiful daughter, he lays next to her on the hospital bed, and as Nat holds their sleeping baby they whisper about how gorgeous she is, and amazing, and incredible, and perfect.

Tony loves them both so damn much. And Natasha loves them both so damn much.
